function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases in densely populated areas such as metropolitan contexts and sub-regional realities with widespread urbanization.","Impact":"High mortality rates and increased burden on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and efficient healthcare infrastructure.","Technologies":"Surveillance and monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine.","People":"Residents of densely populated areas, commuters, and individuals in densely populated urban areas.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and urban planners."},{"Description":"Uncertainty and temporary interventions in the housing sector due to the pandemic, leading to potential disruptions in the sharing economy and real estate market.","Impact":"Financial instability, reduced profitability, and potential social inequalities in access to housing.","Mitigation":"Stabilization policies, economic support for affected sectors, and regulatory frameworks for the sharing economy.","Technologies":"Digital platforms for remote real estate transactions, data analytics for housing market trends, and online rental management tools.","People":"Housing sector workers, renters, and individuals relying on the sharing economy.","Owner":"Government agencies, housing authorities, and economic policy makers."}]}
